title: 317. What Can Uber Teach Us About the Gender Pay Gap?
description: The gig economy offers the ultimate flexibility to set your own hours. That's why economists thought it would help eliminate the gender pay gap. A new study, using data from over a million Uber drivers, finds the story isn't so simple.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: The gig economy offers the ultimate flexibility to set your own hours. That's why economists thought it would help eliminate the gender pay gap. A new study, using data from over a million Uber drivers, finds the story isn't so simple.
